sentences.en: A new modelling method - shape surface elemental feature is created.
sentences.cn: 并提出了形面要素特征建模方法.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Nano red elemental selenium has anti - aging function at nutritional level.
sentences.cn: 结论适当剂量的纳米红色元素硒具有延缓衰老保健作用.

sentences.en: Elemental Mastery and Nature's Swiftness can all be dispelled using purge.
sentences.cn: 元素掌握和自然迅捷都可以被驱散.

sentences.en: Love and fear are two of the most elemental human emotions.
sentences.cn: 爱和恐惧是人类最基本的两种情感。

sentences.en: More positive elemental information could almost certainly be obtained.
sentences.cn: 几乎肯定能够得到更为可靠的基础资料.

sentences.en: One kind of elemental atoms and all other elemental atoms are variant.
sentences.cn: 一种元素的原子与所有其它元素的原子是不同的.

sentences.en: Protection by gas relay is one of the elemental protection of transformer.
sentences.cn: 气体继电器保护是电力变压器的一种基本保护.

sentences.en: The city was struck by the elemental violence of the storm.
sentences.cn: 该城市遭到了大自然强烈风暴的袭击.

sentences.en: the elemental fury of the storm
The optimal oxidation condition was determined by thermal analysis and elemental analysis.
sentences.cn: 用热分析法和元素分析法,确定了最佳氧化条件.

sentences.en: The phenomenon of elemental paragenesis and separation in deposits is ubiquitous.
sentences.cn: 元素共生分异现象在矿床中是普遍存在的.

sentences.en: The plastic elemental stiffness matrix was derived by plastic - hinge method.
sentences.cn: 然后用塑性铰法推导了单元的塑性刚度矩阵.

sentences.en: The structures of are identified by IR, HNMR and elemental analysis.
sentences.cn: 通过红外光谱 、 核磁共振氢谱、元素分析确证了化合物的结构.

sentences.en: This new and elemental environment seemed to call for a savage repression.
sentences.cn: 这新的粗野的环境要求的似乎是一种野蛮的约束.

sentences.en: Tip: Elemental arrows refer to Water, Fire , Gas, and Moss arrows.
sentences.cn: 提示: 元素箭指的是水箭 、 火箭 、 毒气箭和青苔箭.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, elemental analysis will not yield any information as to the extent of contamination by urea.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是, 元素分析不能指出这个盐夹杂尿素的程度.
